response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100 to us, but considering your appreciation for its value, I'm willing to extend this exclusive opportunity to you. I propose a price of $120 for the product. This offer includes a limited-time discount, ensuring you get a great deal. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits of our product at an affordable price. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
